publications.title: DCSEG: Decoupled 3D Open-Set Segmentation using Gaussian Splatting
publications.authors: Luis Wiedmann*, Luca Wiehe*, David Rozenberszki
publications.venue: CVPR 2025 Workshop: Open-World 3D Scene Understanding with Foundation Models
publications.abstract: We present DCSEG, a novel approach for decoupled 3D open-set segmentation that leverages Gaussian Splatting for efficient and accurate scene understanding in open-world scenarios.

publications.title: Interdisciplinary Analysis of European Researchers Using NLP
publications.venue: Bachelor's Thesis, Technical University of Munich
publications.abstract: This thesis presents a novel approach to analyzing the interdisciplinary nature of European researchers using Natural Language Processing techniques. The study examines collaboration patterns and research diversity across various academic disciplines.
